video:video.video:title: ICTV032: Big Idea: Pitch and Hello Cloud Winners, Upcoming Contests, and Team Prognosis Interview
video:video.video:description: The 2016 competitions are underway and we already have winners to announce! Check out our Big Idea: Pitch and Hello Cloud winners along with deadlines and advice for future competitions - there are&#8230;

video:video.video:title: ICTV031: World Finals Recap, 2016 Season with New Contests for all Skill Levels
video:video.video:description: The 2015 World Finals have ended and what an amazing week it was! Which brings us right into the new 2016 Imagine Cup Season! Pablo and Gonlaz review the 2016 competitions and the many opportunities&#8230;

video:video.video:title: ICTV030: World Finals Judges, Awards, and Break Into Code winners
video:video.video:description: We've got lots of updates this episode! Announcing a celebrity judge for the Imagine Cup World Championship, two brand new World Finals awards, and the grand finale - the Break Into Code competition&#8230;

video:video.video:title: ICTV029: Introducing Pablo
video:video.video:description: Introducing Pablo, the new Imagine Cup competition manager. He's got a ton of competition updates; Imagine Cup World Finals, Code Hunt, and Break into code. Excitement is building for the 2015 Imagine&#8230;

video:video.video:title: ICTV028: Eyenaemia Meets Bill Gates
video:video.video:description: John and Golnaz are back for a new season of Imagine Cup TV and they've got big news: the 2014 Imagine Cup World Champion, Team Eyenaemia from Australia, have returned to Seattle for their meeting&#8230;

video:video.video:title: ICTV Special: 2014 World Finalist Teams
video:video.video:description: In this very special episode of ICTV, John and Golnaz reveal all the World Finals teams heading to Seattle in July 2014 as well as the winners of the Skype Award, the Visual Studio Online Boost, and&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 21: Top of the Space Needle
video:video.video:description: The 2014 Imagine Cup World Finals are coming to Seattle in July. Golnaz and John are standing at the very top of Seattle's iconic Space Needle, despite Golnaz's famous fear of heights -- but why? Find&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 20: Getting Hired at Microsoft
video:video.video:description: Meet Max! Max competed in Imagine Cup for several years and was also a Microsoft Student Partner. Today he's a programmer on the Microsoft Exchange team in Redmond and he's got a story to share.

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 019: Brain Games Winners, Contest Tips, and the Tech Awards
video:video.video:description: We've got the November and December winners of our Brain Games 2.0 Challenge and you'll hear what they're doing with their $1,000 prizes! Plus, Golnaz pretends to be a business owner so John can pitch&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 018: How to Win the UX Challenge
video:video.video:description: John &amp; Golnaz announce the winners of the Pitch Video Challenge (congratulations, teams!) and then dive into the User Experience Challenge. Wondering what a Hero Scenario User Flow Diagram is?&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 017: New Winners & New Contests
video:video.video:description: John and Golnaz are back . . . again, after Golnaz forgot to push the record button the first time we taped this episode! But we've got the winners of the Pitch Video Challenge and the Imagine Cup&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 016: The Tech Awards and Visual Studio Online!
video:video.video:description: John and Golnaz are working out of a temporary studio -- and what the heck is that noise? In other news, John just went to the Tech Awards with Imagine Cup World Citizenship winner Ana Ferraz, we've&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 15: All Around Seattle
video:video.video:description: John and Golnaz hit the streets and get out to famous Seattle landmarks including the Pike Place Market Gum Wall, the Great Wheel, and more! Will they find a great place to host the 2014 World Finals&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 014: Student Apps and Making a Pitch Video
video:video.video:description: Made an app for the Windows Store or Windows Phone Store? John and Golnaz have news for you. And if you're thinking about the Pitch Video Challenge, the deadline is October 25. Watch Team JohnNaz as&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 013: The Start of the New Season
video:video.video:description: John and Golnaz are back with a whole new season of Imagine Cup TV! First we catch up on the results from our 2013 World Finals in St. Petersburg, Russia, as well as our recent winners from the&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 012: It's Worldwide Finals Time!
video:video.video:description: John and Golnaz are headed for Russia but they aren't going alone! More than three hundred students are going too and we've got some advice for them. And if you just want to stay home and follow&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 011: TechEd, Team Pages, Samsung Award, Women's App Challenge!
video:video.video:description: Golnaz went to New Orleans and is SO EXCITED! John was on a boat. The Imagine Cup World Finalists Team Gallery is live now on our site. Samsung is sponsoring a new award for world finalists. The&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 010: BBC's Matt Smith hosts Imagine Cup, Facebook Creativity Award, Avanade&#8230;
video:video.video:description: Golnaz visited the United States Imagine Cup Local Finals, Matt Smith is hosting our awards ceremony at Worldwide Finals this July, Facebook is giving an award, Avanade is sponsoring a special Women&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 009: Moscow Local Finals; Robot Baby; Social Media Team; and the KFC Russia&#8230;
video:video.video:description: John has been eating bad airplane food and checking out amazing robots at the Imagine Cup Russia Local Final. The Microsoft Student Partners Social Media Team has been blogging like crazy to cover all&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 008: You Snooze, You Lose; Kodu Challenge; Mail.Ru Group Award; and Mr. Octo!
video:video.video:description: April 15 is the big deadline to submit projects to Imagine Cup. Are you ready? John and Golnaz realize they can finally program thanks to Kodu Game Lab and the new Imagine Cup Kodu Challenge. There's&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 007: AppCampus Award, Awesome Andrew Parsons, and the Final Big Board!
video:video.video:description: John's been petting a sloth, Golnaz got her taxes done, and it's deadline day for Imagine Cup team registrations! Plus they've got a sweet new award for Windows Phone teams to learn about, a new video&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 006: New award and new challenge, the secret of Howest, and the Big Board!
video:video.video:description: John's heading out on vacation and Golnaz is reliving her past as a basketball/skateboard/swiming all-star. They've got the scoop on a new Imagine Cup award and a new challenge plus a look at a&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 006A Bonus Episode: Competition Secrets of Howest College
video:video.video:description: University College West Flanders, also known as Howest, has had a finalist team in every Imagine Cup worldwide finals since 2008. How do they do it? John and Golnaz want to find out . . .

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 005: Windows Azure Boost, Hear It From the Judge, and the Big Board!
video:video.video:description: John has been on a secret mission, Golnaz has been chillaxing in Hawaii, and they're both back at work just in time to kick off a new prize for Imagine Cup teams using Windows Azure! Plus some tips&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 004: Challenge Deadline Extension, IC Grants Video, and the Big Board!
video:video.video:description: John and Golnaz are back from their holiday vacations and they sure know how to party! (NOT.) We've got great news for anyone worried about the January 15 deadline to pass an Imagine Cup Challenge&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 003: New Gadgets, Amazing IC Grants Winners, and Azure, Azure, Azure!
video:video.video:description: John and Golnaz have sweet new hardware to show off! Plus we take a look at the five Imagine Cup 2012 World Finalist teams who just won up to $100,000 in grants from Microsoft to start their companies&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 002: WOWZAPP, The Tech Awards, and the Big Board!
video:video.video:description: John and Golnaz are back for more and they've been on the road to Helsinki and to Silicon Valley. Check out the latest and greatest from Imagine Cup and watch out for popping toast! edit on WOWZAPP&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Imagine Cup TV Episode 001: Brain Games, Season Update, and Build!
video:video.video:description: It's our first episode and it's a doozy! Join John and Golnaz as we cover the latest and greatest Imagine Cup news: [01:50] - Introducing the Imagine Cup Brain Games Challenge [06:48] - Season Update&#8230;
